alert.note: Alert for Panola; Rusk (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 5:44PM CDT until May 13 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Panola County in northeastern Texas... Central Rusk County in northeastern Texas... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 543 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Minden, or 8 miles southeast of Henderson, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Henderson, Overton, New London, Pinehill, Minden, Joinerville, Mount Enterprise, Chapman, Monroe, Church Hill, Oak Hill and Brachfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
